message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'd really love! I'm asking for $120 for it. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I can only pay $95 for it. Looking forward to your response!
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping for a little closer to my initial asking price.  Would you be willing to pay $105 for the product?  That would be a fair price for both of us.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product. I hope this meets in the middle for us.
